import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { cart, fav, logoText, user } from "../assets"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { UserMenu } from "./UserMenu"; import CartContext from "../context/cartContext"; import UserContext from "../context/userContext"; import { getAuth, signOut } from "firebase/auth"; export const Header = () => { const cartItems = useContext(CartContext); const [cartQty, setCartQty] = useState(cartItems.cartArray); useEffect(() => { setCartQty(cartItems.cartArray.length); }, [cartItems.cartArray]); const toggleMenu = () => { document.getElementById("menu").classList.toggle("hidden"); }; const auth = useContext(UserContext); signOut(getAuth()) .then(() => { console.log(auth); }) .catch((error) => { // An error happened. }); return (
{/* MOBILE MENU */}

{/* LAPTOP MENU */}

) : (
